description: Worked on developing a zomato like search and discovery website
Was one of the chief UI/UX designers and aimed at creating a responsive web design
As a college intern, it was a huge learning experience that started my journey in software development
Worked on Database Management, Automation of various services, and Web Development. Accomplished the task of developing a centralised timesheet for better Resource Management
Reduced considerable amount of time spent on transferring files through FTP by automating and scheduling the services on a server
Interacted with and supported global clients by troubleshooting and analysing root causes at different development stages

Built the company's minimalist and responsive website and employed Google Technologies to analyse and optimise visibility. Also incorporated Open Graph into the website for better social media integration
This being my first freelancing project, it pushed me to work differently and taught me a lot about time management and productivity
Worked with the company and its subsidiary branches to develop software solutions and considerably improved its finance and resource management

Built an interface that monitored inventory levels and stock availability and maintained sale and purchase records. Also automated the tracking of Auctions through Java GUI and reduced 5-6 hours of manual work
It was a great learning experience in leadership and project management as I supervised and led a team of 4-5 developers to meet project deadlines using Agile Scrum Methodology
